info.description:
During a scuffle with Lex Luther, Superman's archenemy, Lex manages to knock Superman unconscious by injecting him with a kryptonite serum which he perfected himself.

When Superman cam to, he found himself striped to his boxer shorts, and restrained to/in/by a...?
